title: handwritten font : yay? or nay?
content:
I created this font with intent to use it for personal branding - suggestions on making it more successful?  
Also, looking for any feedback regarding legibility. Any letters look funky?  
Thank you for your time!

Catie

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317200325im_/http:/typophile.com/files/catiefontwebreview_5513.jpg)
author: catie menke

comments.content: Cap S seems to tip too much to left + I agree with Riccardo on the G.

The "G" might look "funny", but it's also nicely idiosyncratic, which to me is what handwriting is mostly about.

hhp
Yes, the G is idiosyncratic, and by itself might be interesting, but it seems out of place in the context of the rest of the letterforms in the font to my eye.
